text: Total Souls||This is the total amount of {{tr:icon_money}}Souks available to your faction. Souls can be generated via buildings, loot from winning battles, raiding and diplomacy.
The available {{tr:icon_treasury}}Souls is displayed at the top of the screen on the campaign interface.

Souls are unique -  the life-force of the unliving, the more Dark Magic will be drawn to them. If the Winds of Dhar are shared between powerful Vampires and Necromancers, however, Dark Magic becomes more difficult to accumulate -  their Undead legions requiring more energy to remain bound.
